column4: www-data is the default owner of everything in /var/www/  What's the easiest way, as a regular user, to write to this directory without having to do a chown to www-data every time so that something like a test wordpress site can write and change files?
sudo or be part os some sort of www-data group,then you'll be able to write everywhere group www-data is allowed to write
